name: Neudesic
description:
Neudesic is the trusted technology partner in business innovation, delivering impactful business results to clients through leading-edge technologies, innovative solutions, and strategic alliances.  Founded in 2002 and headquartered in Irvine, California, Neudesic is a privately held company, serving clients globally from offices across the United States and India.
Neudesic has earned an unparalleled reputation for the depth and breadth of our technical knowledge and business acumen. By systemically applying this expertise to clients' individual business needs, Neudesic helps provide a sustainable competitive advantage based on unique industry insights and relationships.  This combination of knowledge, strategic business alliances, diverse experience and technology expertise allows Neudesic to deliver scalable, durable and inventive solutions that provide clients with the shortest path to success.
A variety of designations and certifications demonstrate the level of expertise achieved including several consultants holding the Microsoft MVP and the Microsoft Virtual Technical Specialist designations based on their depth of expertise and their passion for technology.
